explains: adv. 剧烈地，明显地；戏剧性地，夸张地

sentences.en: The cost of living has increased dramatically.
sentences.cn: 生活费用已大幅增长了。

sentences.en: The number of homeless people has increased dramatically.
sentences.cn: 无家可归者的人数急剧增加了。

sentences.en: At speeds above 50 mph, serious injuries dramatically increase.
sentences.cn: 时速超过50英里时，重伤机率急剧上升。
